title: Chalet Hotels acquires Courtyard by Marriott Aravali for Rs 315 crore
description: Chalet said since its commencement in June 2022, the resort has been the preferred choice for leisure travelers, MICE and destination weddings and that it is 'strategically' located within 1.5 hours from New Delhi, Gurgaon and Noida. Chalet said the resort boasts easy accessibility to the Indira Gandhi International Airport New Delhi.
